PARTIES
Plaitiff FTC is an independent agency of the United States Governent created' by statute. 15 U. C. gg 41- 58.. The. FTC enforces Section 5(a) of the FTC Act , 15 U.
g 45(a), which prohibits unair
or deceptive
acts or practices in or affecting commerce. The
Commission also enforces Section 12 of the FTC Act , 15 U. C. g 52 , which prohibits the dissemination of false. advertsements. for food, drgs , devices , services or cosmetics in or affecting commerce. The Commssion may intiate federal distrct cour proceedigs to enjoin

Defendant Heritage Health Products Company ("Heritage ) is a Colorado corporation with its pricipal offce. or place of business at 400 N. Lin Lane ,
Fort Colli , CO
80524. It transacts , or has transacted, business in ths Distrct
the. United States
and throughout
through the advertsing, marketing, and sale of Heritage Shark Carilage and Heritage Cat' Claw , among other products , via flyers and the mternet site

ww.heritagehealthproducts. com
Defendant Heritage has. engaged in the deceptive acts and practices and the
makg of false. advertisements as alleged below and is liable. for said acts and practices.
COMMRCE The acts and practices of the. defendant, as alleged herein, are in or affecting commerce , as " commerce" is defied in Section 4 ofthe FTC Act , 15 U.
C. g 44.
DEFENDANT' S COURE OF CONDUCT Since at least Januar 2001 , and contiuing thereafter, defendant has advertised
promoted , offered for sale , sold, and distrbuted the products Heritage Shark Carilage .and Heritage Cat' s Claw to the public throughout the United States.. Heritage Shark Cartilage!

carti/ago de tiburon
is a dietar
supplement containing chondroitin sulfate. from purfied shark carilage extract. 10.

dissemiated or caused to
be.
dissemiated flyers and Internet advertisements on English and

ww.heritagehealthproducts. com. Heritage
advertisements include , but are not lited to , the attached Exhbits A (Heritage flyer), B (shark

(EXCERPTS FROM BOTH FLYER AND INTERNT SITE)
Numerous clincal studies have pointed to. the positive effects associated with chondroitin sulfate preparations (such as. Heritage Shark Carilage).. Kuetter has discovered the potent anti -angiogenic activity of carilage extracts. .. These- facts suggest that Heritage. Shark Carilage possesses notable antiangiogenic action.
. . . This concept is important to understand in connection with shark carilage and its anti-tuor benefits.. . .. A tuor must continually recrut new blood vessels simply to keep from witherig away.
Shark carilage has been proven as. an anti-angiogenic agent, as it literally tuor of its blood supply. Other inamatory processes such as arhrtis are also dependent upon rapid growth of blood vessels.. Thus , Heritage Shark Carlage. can prove very effective in counteractig these angiogenicdependent ailments. stares. a

(sic 1 0. artis reumatoidea y el cancer.

de Tiburon de Heritage

(EXCERPTS. FROM THE HERIAGE INTERNT SITE) Cat' s Claw. . . is a medicinal plant from the Peruvian Amazon Rai
Forest. . . .
. . .. The. alkaloids (in Cat' s. Claw J have strong antioxidant properties in addition to antiviral and anti-inamatory properties. il an inormal marketing poll performed in Lima , Peru it was found that 30% ofthose polled believeCat' s Claw cures cancer. . . . . Overall , 35% ofthose polled report that a family member has consumed Cat' s Claw for some kind of illness -, be it rheumatism , gastrtis , for the liver or kidneys , to increase imunty or a myrad of other ailments.. . . .

Claw include:
. Ski Health. . Joint Health. .
Maintainig a healthy imune system. Mild mood changes , cramps , and edema associated with the menstral (sic) cycle.
Exhbit E (ww. heritagehealthproducts. com/englproducts/catsclaw. htm) . (EXCERPTS FROM SPANSH LANGUAGE PORTION OF INERNT SITE)
Los experientos inciales de. ( el cientifico austraco , Klaus J Keplinger con laUfia de Gato , revelaron resultados. positivos en el tratamento de enfermedades viales. mortales en gatos y corderos. Los estudios humanos de inecciones de herpes realiados por Keplinger
tambien fueron positivos.
Desde la decada de los 70s. hasta el presente , losestudios conducidos en centros de investigaci6n de Peru , Austra, Alemana, fuglaterra, Hungara e Italia sugieron que ' la Uncara Tomentosa puede ser beneficiosa en el tratamiento. del cancer, el sindrome. pre-menstral (irregulardades del ciclo femenino), artis bursitis , el reumatismo , alergias , ulceras , y otro des6rdenes. El Dr. Brent W. Davis , D. , quien ha venido trabajando. con la Uncara Tomentosa des de hace varos afos en los Estados Unidos , se ha referido a esta hierba como ' la precursora del camino , debido a su notable habilidad para limpiar el tracto intestinal completo y para ayudar a pacientes que padecen muchos des6rdenes estomacales. e incluyendo el Mal de Crahn, divertculitis , sindrome de. escape del intestino hemorroides , colitis , fistulas , gastrtis , ulceras , parasitos y desequilibrio de la flora intestinal. Donna Schwontkowki,
Doctora en Medicina Quiropnictica e fuvestigadora . . . cataloga a la Una de. Gato como. ' la hierba mas poderosa que aumenta la imunologia. ' Sus estudios prelimares han revel ado que la Ufia de Gato. se distingue por su . . .
Habilidad para detener inecciones virales en sus etapas tempranas , es decir, cuando un individuo. siente que comienza una infecci6n 0 cuando ya padece de fiebre , agotamento , dolores musculares y garganta irtada. Capacidad para ayudar a pacientes que son quimicamente ensitivos dismiuyendo el agotamento. que acompaia a este tipo de problemas y reduciendo. la severidad de los sintomas. Page 7 of 16
Habilidad para realzar signficativamente la estabilidad emocional , en medio de tension extrema proveniente de problemas personales.
ali
Habilidad para ayudar el cuerpo. a combatir las inecciones en pacientes con SIDA: Capacidad para reducir el tamafo. visible de. alguos crecimientos de la piel , tuores 0 quistes en dos semanas.
En su aclamado libro , Vibrational Healig, el Medico. Richard Gerber menciona . . . que ' (la Una de Gato J ofrece grandes promesas para el tratamiento de artis cuando se toma intemamente , 0. sea, mediante la preparacion de tes 0 tomando capsulas de la hierba
Finalente , sugiere que la Una de. Gato. puede ser util en la reduccion de los efectos secundaros de la radiacion y la quioterapia asociados con la tratamentos de
cancer.

Claw revealed positive results in the. treatment of mortal viral sicknesses in cats and lambs.. Keplinger s human studies of herpes inections also were positive.
Beginng in the 1970s through present- day, studies conducted at research facilities in Peru , Austra, Gennany, England , Hungr, and Italy suggest that Uncaria Tomentosa may be beneficial in the treatment of cancer, pre-menstrual syndrome (iregularties of the femie cycle), arhrtis , bursitis , rheumatism allergies , ulcers and other disorders... completely clean the intestial
tract and for helping patients sufferig many
stomach and intestinal disorders , includig Crohn' s. Disease , diverticulitis , escape syndrome of the intestine , hemorrhoids , colitis , fistulas , gastrtis , ulcers , parasites and disequilibrium of the intestinal flora.

preliar
Ability to halt viral infections in their early stages , that is to. say, when individual feels. the of an infection or when he. is already sufferig fever, exhaustion, muscle pains , and sore. thoat. begig
extreme tension arsing from personal problems. Abilty to. help the body combat the. inections. in patlents with AIS. Capacity to reduce the visible size of some. ski growths , tuors or cysts in two
weeks.
il his acclaied book, Vibrational Healing, Dr. Richard Gerber, mentions . . . that' (Cat' s Claw I offers great promise for the treatment of arhrtis when taken internally, for instance , by preparng it in tea or takg the. herb in capsule form..
Finally, it has been suggested that Cat' s Claw can be useful in reducing the secondar effects of radiation and chemotherapy associated with the. treatment cancer. Translation of Exhibit F.
DEFENDANT' S VIOLATIONS OF. THE. FTC ACT 13.
Section 5(a) of the FTC Act , 15 U. C. g 45(a), prohibits unai or deceptive acts
or practices in or affectig commerce. Section 12(a) of the. FTC Act, 15. U. C. g 52(a), prohibits the dissemiation of any false advertisement in or affectig commerce for the purose
inducing, or which is. liely
to induce ,
of
the purchase of food , drgs , devices , services or cosmetics.
For the. puroses of Section 12 of the FTC Act , Heritage Shark Cartilage and Heritage

Cat' s. Claw are either a "food" or " drg"
as defied in Section 15(b) and (c) of the FTC Act

Sections 5(a) and 12 of the. FTC Act , 15 U. C. g 45(a) and 52 ,. in connection with the marketig
and sale of Heritage Shark Carilage
and Heritage
Cat's Claw.

Through the means. described in Paragraph 10 , defendant has represented
expressly or by implication, that:
fugestion of Heritage ' s -shark carilage is an effective treatment for lupus , herpes ulcers , wound healing, phlebitis , hemorrhoids , fistulas , pruitis , varcose veins , acne enteritis , colitis , eczema, psoriasis ,

rheumatoid arhrtis ,
and cancer;
hark carilage is an effective treatment for bacterial

C. gg 45(a) and 52.
COUNT TWO
False Establishment Claim for. Heritage Shark Cartilage 18.

expressly or by implication, that scientific research establishes that ingestion of shark carlage. is
effective in the treatment oflupus , herpes , ulcers , wound healing, phlebitis , hemorrhoids fistulas , pruitis , varcose. veins , acne , enteritis , colitis , eczema, psoriasis , osteoarhrtis rheumatoid artis , and cancer.

and cancer.. Therefore , the makg ofthe representation set forth in Page 11 of 16

and 52.

and52. CONSUMER INJUY 25.
. Defendant' s law violations have injured consumers throughout the United States.
fu addition, defendant has been unjustly enrched as a result of its unawfu practices. Absent injunctive relief by ths Cour , defendant is likely to continue to injure consumers , reap unust
enrchment , and har the public. interest. 26.
Section 13(b) ofthePTC Act, 15 US. C. g 53(b), empowers this Cour to grant
injunctive and other relief as. the Cour may deem appropriate to prevent and remedy any Page 14 of 16
violations of the FTC Act. . The Cour, in the. exercise of its equitable jurisdiction, may award
other ancilar relief, includig consumer redress , disgorgement , and restitution, to prevent and
remedy injur caused by defendant's law violations.
PRAYER FOR RELIEF
WHREFORE , Plaintiff FTC requests that this Cour, as authorized by Section 13(b) of the FTC Act , 15 U. C. g 53(b), and pursuant to its own equitable powers:
Enjoin defendant prelimiarly
and permanently from
violating Sections 5(a) and
12 of the FTC Act, as alleged herein , in connection with the offer, sale , advertising, or other
promotion or distrbution of any food,
drg, dietar supplement ,
device , cosmetic , or other
product , service , or program; Award such equitable relief as the. Cour finds necessar to redress. injur
to
consumers resulting from defendant's violations of Sections 5(a) and 12 of the FTC Act including but not limted to rescission of contracts and restitution, and the disgorgement of il-
gotten gains by the defendant; and Award the. plaintiff
the costs of
brigig this action, as well as. such additional
equitable relief as the. cour may determejust and proper.
